title: Annual Trade Summit 2024
description: Join industry leaders for our biggest trade event of the year. Network with professionals, attend keynote sessions, and discover new business opportunities.

title: Monthly Networking Breakfast
description: Connect with fellow trade organization members over breakfast. Informal networking session with light presentations from member businesses.

title: Export Regulations Workshop
description: Comprehensive workshop covering new export regulations and compliance requirements. Essential for businesses engaged in international trade.

title: Small Business Resource Fair
description: Resources and support for small businesses in our trade organization. Connect with service providers, financial institutions, and government agencies.
